rules_text:
When Yearning Clockwork enters, each player draws a card.
Attain {5} [i]({5}: Transform this. Spend at least three colors of mana to activate this, and only as a sorcery.)[/i]
rules_text2:
As this creature transforms into Breathing Spellwork, for each color of mana spent to attain it, it becomes that color.
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may play the top card of your library if it’s colorless or shares a color with Breathing Spellwork.
